item.title: Synology Office Encryption
item.description: The login process and decryption/passworded document workflow with Synology Office is not great. Probably needs to be looked at. I was going to try figure it out and provide a nice diagram of how it works, but I don’t have that much time to dedicate to this issue. But I get stuff like this, when my login as expired, instead of just presenting a login page, it gives me this;
